pullrequest.title: create an AtlasStates.msg aggregating all information in sensor_msgs/JointState sensor_msgs/Imu and atlas_msgs/ForceTorqueSensors so data are synchronized in a single publish.

content.raw:
will do.  for some reason I stayed away from singular because of what happened to `sensor_msgs::JointState` :)

Should the corresponding ros topic change from `/atlas/atlas_states` to `/atlas/state`?
